name: Nils Föelsen, BP
resume_snippet: Nils Föelsen, BP  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	  Experienced chemical and pharmaceutical technician with a strong background in GMP-compliant process engineering, qualification, and validation within pharmaceutical and laboratory environments. Demonstrated expertise in project planning, technology transfer, and equipment commissioning across preclinical and aseptic manufacturing.
